definition: to suffer/fig. reluctantly
to bear/to endure/to tolerate/to restrain oneself
ache/pain/sorrow/deeply/thoroughly
to resign oneself to part with what one treasures

sentences.english: A restructuring wouldn't remove the need for painful budget overhauls.
sentences.chinese: 重组改变不了忍痛实施预算改革的必要性。

sentences.english: Honor he feared injuries, again more encouraged separated, reluctantly he heaped chasing again.
sentences.chinese: 荣恐玥再受伤害，忍痛提出分手，更鼓励浚再追玥。

sentences.english: History records nothing more touching than that agony bursting forth in acclamations.
sentences.chinese: 历史上从没有比那种忍痛的欢呼更动人的了。

sentences.english: In the meanwhile, love and suffer, hope and contemplate.
sentences.chinese: 在死以前，为爱而忍痛，为希望而景仰吧。

sentences.english: Did you know that I am also your fan, but I am willing to reluctantly part with.
sentences.chinese: 您清楚我也是您的影迷，不过我愿意忍痛割爱。

sentences.english: Sometimes, the wisest thing to do is cut our losses and run.
sentences.chinese: 有时，最明智的做法是忍痛割掉损失，向前走。

sentences.english: Have withstood pain to buy many accessories.
As this stock stinks and sinks, will Buffett build his position or cut his losses?
sentences.chinese: 随着该股的沉沦，巴菲特是会增持，还是会忍痛割肉？

sentences.english: They need to learn to make the hard decisions.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要忍痛作出抉择。

sentences.english: When this happens, it’s best to bite the bullet and drop or delay a project or two.
sentences.chinese: 当这发生时，最好忍痛割爱，放弃或推迟一两个计划。

sentences.english: I tore myself away from my wife.
Would you live with ease, do what you ought, and not what you please.
sentences.chinese: 要想活得轻松自在，时时都要忍痛割爱。

sentences.english: Ep666 - Kexin rejects Wenqiang as she thinks that it is not the right timing. Wenqiang is disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 可欣有感时间不对而忍痛回绝文强的求婚，文强难过。

sentences.english: If you would live with ease, do what you ought, and not what you please.
sentences.chinese: 要想活得轻松自在，时时都要忍痛割爱。

sentences.english: Wolf in sheep in order to win the case, so only thing to round his leg to the fox.
sentences.chinese: 绵羊为了告倒狼，所以只好忍痛舍了一条腿给狐狸。

sentences.english: The old cow is clay-cold, both husband and wife endure pain silently to peel off the leather, cow is on the slope.
sentences.chinese: 老牛死后，夫妻俩忍痛剥下牛皮，把牛埋在山坡上。

definition: to resign oneself to part with what one treasures
to act against one's will/to have no alternative but to/to have to/to have no choice/must
to have no alternative (idiom); compelled by circumstances/forced into sth
to hate to do sth/to hate to part with/to begrudge
without any better option/to have to/to be forced to
tearful/tearfully
firmly/resolutely/without hesitation
to clench one's teeth/to grind the teeth/gnaw
not reconciled to/not resigned to
to shed tears/to be all in tears
without hesitation/resolutely/firmly
to have no way out/to have no alternative
to be compelled/to be forced
to have no alternative but to/to be obliged to
to settle for second best/the next best thing
to drop (subject etc)
